mapper.select: SELECT CDNO cdno, CDLVL cdlv, UPCD highcd, CDNAME cdnm, USEYN use FROM CODEMNG CONNECT BY NOCYCLE CDNO = UPCD ORDER SIBLINGS BY CDNO ASC
SELECT CDNO cdno, CDLVL cdlv, UPCD highcd, CDNAME cdnm, USEYN use FROM CODEMNG WHERE CDNO = #{cdno}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO CODEMNG VALUES(
(SELECT 'C'||LPAD(NVL(SUBSTR(MAX(CDNO),2,5)+1,1),4,'0') FROM CODEMNG), #{cdlv}, #{highcd}, #{cdnm}, '관리자', sysdate, #{use} )
mapper.select: SELECT CDNO cdno, CDNAME cdnm FROM CODEMNG WHERE CDLVL = 1
SELECT CDNO cdno, CDNAME cdnm FROM CODEMNG where UPCD = #{cdno}

SELECT ITEMCD itemcd, ITEMNAME itemnm, MADENMCD madenmcd, (SELECT CDNAME FROM CODEMNG WHERE CDNO = #{cdno}) brand, ITEMUNITCD itemunitcd, DECODE(ITEMUNITCD,'C0061', '개', 'C0062', '벌') itemunitcdnm, STOCKAMT stockamt, STOCKYN stockyn, USEYN use FROM ITEMLIST WHERE MADENMCD = #{cdno}

SELECT ITEMCD itemcd, ITEMNAME itemnm, (SELECT CDNAME FROM CODEMNG WHERE CDNO = (SELECT MADENMCD FROM ITEMLIST WHERE ITEMCD = #{itemcd})) brand, DECODE(ITEMUNITCD,'C0061', '개', 'C0062', '벌') itemunitcdnm, ITEMUNITCD itemunitcd, USEYN use, (SELECT INSAMT FROM INITEMLIST WHERE INITEMLIST.ITEMCD = #{itemcd}) qow FROM ITEMLIST WHERE ITEMCD = #{itemcd}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ITEMLIST VALUES( (SELECT 'I'||LPAD(NVL(SUBSTR(MAX(ITEMCD),2,5)+1,1),4,'0') FROM ITEMLIST), #{itemnm}, #{brand}, #{itemunitcd}, (SELECT NVL(MAX(STOCKAMT)+1,1) FROM ITEMLIST WHERE ITEMCD = (SELECT 'I'||LPAD(NVL(SUBSTR(MAX(ITEMCD),2,5)+1,1),4,'0') FROM ITEMLIST)), 'N', '관리자', sysdate, #{use}, 'C0000' )
mapper.select: SELECT ITEMLIST.ITEMCD itemcd, ITEMNAME itemnm, ITEMLIST.MADENMCD madenmcd, (SELECT CDNAME FROM CODEMNG WHERE ITEMLIST.MADENMCD = CODEMNG.CDNO) brand, ITEMLIST.ITEMUNITCD itemunitcd, (SELECT CDNAME FROM CODEMNG WHERE ITEMLIST.ITEMUNITCD = CODEMNG.CDNO) itemunitcdnm, INSAMT qow, INSITEMLISTCD whcd FROM ITEMLIST, INITEMLIST WHERE ITEMLIST.ITEMCD = INITEMLIST.ITEMCD AND INITEMLIST.INSDATE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YY/MM/DD')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO INITEMLIST VALUES( #{itemcd}, (SELECT 'II'||LPAD(NVL(SUBSTR(MAX(INSITEMLISTCD),3,10)+1,1),8,'0') FROM INITEMLIST), #{qow}, SYSDATE, '관리자' )
mapper.select: SELECT INSITEMLISTCD whcd, INITEMLIST.ITEMCD itemcd, ITEMNAME itemnm, (SELECT CDNAME FROM CODEMNG WHERE CDNO = MADENMCD) brand, ITEMUNITCD itemunitcd, (SELECT CDNAME FROM CODEMNG WHERE CDNO = ITEMUNITCD) itemunitcdnm, INSAMT qow FROM INITEMLIST, ITEMLIST WHERE INITEMLIST.ITEMCD = ITEMLIST.ITEMCD AND INITEMLIST.INSITEMLISTCD = #{whcd}
